original_text: And it came to pass on the morrow, that Moses sat to judge the people: and the people stood by Moses from the morning unto the evening.
korean_text: 이튿날 모세가 백성을 재판하느라고 앉아 있고 백성은 아침부터 저녁까지 모세 곁에 서 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass on the morrow
that Moses sat to judge the people
and the people stood by Moses
from the morning unto the evening
